rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究表明头孢西丁是治疗羊膜内感染的有效一线药物头孢西丁治疗子宫内膜炎和羊膜内感染（IAI）的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-study-reveals-cefoxitin-as- effective-first-line-treatment-for-intraamniotic-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-study-reveals-cefoxitin-as- effective-first-line-treatment-for-intraamniotic-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00b8bbe8-81da-4d92-befa-0c0943464707 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 04:47:00 -0500 New study reveals cefoxitin as effective first-line treatment for intraamniotic infections
新型疟疾疫苗的三期试验显示在保护儿童方面取得了可喜的成果今天，R21/Matrix-M™ 疟疾疫苗 3 期疗效试验的同行评审结果发表在《柳叶刀》上。该研究在四个非洲国家的多个地点进行，涉及 4,800 名 5-36 个月大的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Phase-3-trial-of-new-malaria-vaccine-reveals-promising-results-in-protecting-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Phase-3-trial-of-new-malaria-vaccine-reveals-promising-results-in-protecting-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21193978-e7ef-4ed0-9af8-a0c4563afdcc Mon, 05 Feb 2024 01:27:00 -0500 Phase 3 trial of new malaria vaccine reveals promising results in protecting children
邮政编码的生命彩票：ONS数据揭示了英国各地令人震惊的预期寿命差距你居住的地方不一定决定你的寿命。一位权威专家表示，需要定期进行测试来结束邮政编码健康彩票。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Postcode-lottery-of-life-ONS-data-reveals-shocking-life-expectancy-gaps-across-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Postcode-lottery-of-life-ONS-data-reveals-shocking-life-expectancy-gaps-across-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=332f0bc3-6d93-4c7f-aa58-78dfc455aed4 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 01:23:00 -0500 Postcode lottery of life: ONS data reveals shocking life expectancy gaps across UK
UVA 科学家开发新的机器学习方法来识别心脏药物弗吉尼亚大学的科学家开发了一种新的机器学习方法（人工智能的一种形式）来识别有助于减少心脏病发作或其他伤害后有害疤痕的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/UVA-scientists-develop-new-approach-to-machine-learning-for-identifying-heart-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/UVA-scientists-develop-new-approach-to-machine-learning-for-identifying-heart-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24ab82cc-e4e4-4fb5-be9b-625a6dcd44a0 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 01:04:00 -0500 UVA scientists develop new approach to machine learning for identifying heart drug
MHRA 通过两个新的批准机构扩大了医疗器械制造商的选择范围药品和保健产品监管机构 (MHRA) 指定了两个新的英国批准机构，为医疗保健专业人员和公众提供增强的医疗器械性能和安全认证能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/MHRA-expands-options-for-medical-device-manufacturers-with-two-new-Approved-Bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/MHRA-expands-options-for-medical-device-manufacturers-with-two-new-Approved-Bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66aaf1fd-e236-4b89-8d28-23fc18f62d82 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 00:53:00 -0500 MHRA expands options for medical device manufacturers with two new Approved Bodies
Almirall 和微软合作开发人工智能驱动的皮肤科药物发现专注于医学皮肤科的全球制药公司 Almirall SA 今天宣布与微软建立战略合作伙伴关系，共同推动创新和数字化转型，推进皮肤病医疗解决方案的研究，加速公司的数字化转型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Almirall-and-Microsoft-partner-on-AI-powered-drug-discovery-in-dermatology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Almirall-and-Microsoft-partner-on-AI-powered-drug-discovery-in-dermatology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=666b3d26-f9d6-4308-9b62-4b3cf11daf55 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 00:30:00 -0500 Almirall and Microsoft partner on AI-powered drug discovery in dermatology
医生担心在线医疗记录访问的工作量和诉讼：英国研究发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的同类最大规模研究的结果表明，大多数接受调查的家庭医生担心让患者在线访问其医疗记录会增加他们的工作量和诉讼风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Doctors-fear-workload-lawsuits-with-online-medical-records-access-UK-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Doctors-fear-workload-lawsuits-with-online-medical-records-access-UK-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a55d2dfb-d1f8-40b7-9177-ee57cbd261fb Mon, 05 Feb 2024 00:21:00 -0500
eLabNext 和 Promega 联手加速生命科学实验室的数字化转型eLabNext（Eppendorf 集团旗下公司）是数字实验室平台提供商，为生命科学实验室提供实验室库存管理系统 (LIMS)、电子实验室笔记本 (ELN) 和人工智能 (AI)/机器学习 (ML) 解决方案，以及Promega 公司 (Promega) 是生命科学行业创新技术、工具和技术的全球领导者，今天宣布开展合作，使 Promega 的标准操作程序 (SOP) 可以通过 eLabNext 的 eLabMarketplace 轻松访问。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/eLabNext-and-Promega-join-forces-to-accelerate-digital-transformation-in-life-science-labs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/eLabNext-and-Promega-join-forces-to-accelerate-digital-transformation-in-life-science-labs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bc0a6b9-1616-408f-8542-1da02c05b93a Mon, 05 Feb 2024 00:18:00 -0500 eLabNext and Promega join forces to accelerate digital transformation in life science labs
Xist lncRNA 被确定为女性偏向性自身免疫性疾病的关键触发因素研究人员发现，女性特有的 Xist 核糖核蛋白复合物是性别偏向性自身免疫的关键驱动因素，这为了解女性自身免疫性疾病的高患病率提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240204/Xist-lncRNA-identified-as-key-trigger-in-female-biased-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240204/Xist-lncRNA-identified-as-key-trigger-in-female-biased-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=845188ea-c59f-4b57-84b4-3f3d390c4499 Sun, 04 Feb 2024 20:05:00 -0500 Xist lncRNA identified as key trigger in female-biased autoimmune diseases
斋月禁食与有利的代谢变化和降低慢性病风险有关斋月禁食可显着降低肺癌、结直肠癌和乳腺癌的风险，通过全面的代谢组学研究显示出有益的代谢变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240204/Ramadan-fasting-linked-to-favorable-metabolic-changes-and-reduced-chronic-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240204/Ramadan-fasting-linked-to-favorable-metabolic-changes-and-reduced-chronic-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a66444db-c372-4f8d-b835-ef89ad3b3ba0 Sun, 04 Feb 2024 19:42:00 -0500 Ramadan fasting linked to favorable metabolic changes and reduced chronic disease risk
